job description:
Our client is currently seeking a Data Analyst for a contract-to-hire role in Deerfield, IL.

This job will have the following responsibilities:
  • Responsible for Provider Information Management DataMart maintenance, assist with Provider Data DataMart development.
  • Assist with provider cost file creation, data gap analysis.
  • Facilitate with ad hoc cost inquiry tickets/requests.
  • Identify and recommend new ways to streamline processes.
  • Document work processes.
  • Work independently, but in accordance with team processes and protocols.
  • Provide production support, including working with internal clients to identify issues and to ensure customer satisfaction.
  • Maintain/develop Provider Data Support QlikView Solution.
Qualifications & Requirements:
  • Intermediate SQL and Excel skills.
  • Knowledge of Data Warehousing concepts.
  • Experience working with SQL Server.
  • Conduct requirements gathering from Business users.
  • Solid written and oral communication skills.
  • An eye for detail and a commitment to accuracy.
  • Strong analytical skills with an ability to work independently with minimal guidance.
ID: 592932
Type: Contract
Salary: Open - provided by Dice

Analysis, Analyst, Analytical Skills, Development, Excel, Management, Protocols, SQL, SQL Server
